name: Bazooka Panic!
description:
This is the 12th of 12 games we made in 2020. If you want to see what's next, check out our Patreon. You can also donate via itch. Happy New Year!

By rocket or by wing, get to the top of the tower!

[ARROW KEYS] or [WASD] to Move
[Z] or [SPACE] to Jump
[X] or [J] to Shoot
[ENTER] or [P] to Pause

Presented by SuperTry Studios

Music by Joe Kenneally

Game by Kevin Cole

Special Thanks to:
Hadley St. Clair
Bryan Shepherd
Jeff Pennington
and Marc Boutin

This game was made possible by our Patrons
